channel.description: If there's outlandish governmetn policy, unbelievable conduct by celebrities and public figures or anything just plain ludicrous, Desmond is the source.

item.title: Insane gas prices
item.description: 3-bucks a gallon before summer? You can thank greedy oil companies and your fellow gluttonous Americans who feel the need to “sit up high” when they drive.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 3-bucks a gallon before summer? You can thank greedy oil companies and your fellow gluttonous Americans who feel the need to “sit up high” when they drive.

item.title: Keep the exit exam!
item.description: Is a high school diploma worth anything? After years of California saying it would require students to pass an exit exam to graduate high school, some whiners and an opportunistic lawyer claim its unconstitutional. Isn’t it reasonable to ask students to demonstrate what they learned?
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Is a high school diploma worth anything? After years of California saying it would require students to pass an exit exam to graduate high school, some whiners and an opportunistic lawyer claim its unconstitutional.

Isn’t it reasonable to ask students to demonstrate what they learned?”

item.title: Global Warming lunacy
item.description: Is there argument more tired than the “Liberal conspiracy” of global warming? Not now, thanks to Al Gore’s amazing new movie on global warming. Just accept it World: We’ve screwed up our planet and now we need to fix it! Fear not, Desmond has some solutions to the problem before Manhattan is swallowed by the sea.

item.title: The Gay Marriage debacle
item.description: Pop quiz: Which of these three issues is most threatening America? Is it… A.) The War in Iraq, B.) Illegal Immigration or C.) Gay Marriage? Congress, in its usually tomfoolery, has chosen gay Marriage this week. INSANITY!
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Ann Coulter: Lunatic Extraordinaire
item.description: You thought Cindy Sheehan was an attention whore? She's got nothing on this psycho blonde! She advocates murder, violence, and repealing her own voting rights. Behold the tirades of the uber right!
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Why is Marijuana Illegal?
item.description: It’s time to stop this madness and just legalize this harmless drug. The benefits FAR outweigh any negatives. How can destructive drugs like Alcohol and Cigarettes be legal and this one not? Lobbyists!
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s time to stop this madness and just legalize this harmless drug. The benefits FAR outweigh any negatives. How can destructive drugs like Alcohol and Cigarettes be legal and this one not? Lobbyists!

item.title: Flag Burning and the Dastardly New York Times
item.description: Madness on both sides of the political spectrum. The New York Times continues to fuel allegations against itself of Liberal Bias, and Republicans in the Senate continue to waste their time with a totally unnecessary amendment to the constitution
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: F-U Communists!
item.description: North Korea has a temper tantrum and conducts missile tests in a demand for attention. But who’s the real destabilizing force? Here’s a hint: they’re the ones who probably gave North Korea the technology to throw this hissy fit!
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: So, who killed the electric car?
item.description: Based on the outrageous movie of the same name, you won’t believe the conspiracy between the car and oil companies and the head of the California air resources board to kill the most environmentally friendly car ever built. Listen for a chance to win free tickets to see the movie!
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: The Middle East and a veto for the archaic
item.description: Will the Middle East ever get along? Not likely. Meanwhile, President Bush finally uses his veto power, but instead of using it to reign in ludicrous legislation, he let’s his fanatical base get the best of him to undermine science.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: A case study on parasites
item.description: If you don’t think illegal immigration is a big deal, you haven’t been paying attention! Desmond examines an illegal family with TEN CHILDREN living on 400 dollars a week, and A LOT of support from the federal government. Anybody have the number for INS?

item.title: Big oil strikes again
item.description: It’s happened again. Big oil willingly cuts off our energy supplies for a BS reason, leaving us with higher prices and them with deeper pockets.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: The Media Tirade
item.description: There’s a lot of stuff going on around the world right now, but you wouldn’t know it because America’s sheepish media would rather talk about a sensationalistic 10 year old murder case than the plights of the planet.

item.title: Polygamy madness
item.description: Polygamist, religious cult leader Warren Jeffs has been apprehended by the FBI, leader Desmond wonders how this group has even been allowed to exist for so long. What is the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Later Day Saints? A group of total nut jobs!

item.title: Those Darn Celebrities
item.description: First Mel Gibson, now that airhead Paris Hilton…what’s with these people anyway? Desmond explains the absurd culture of celebrities and the idle rich.

item.title: The idle rich must pay their fair share
item.description: Conservatives are trying to convince the average hard working stiff that the estate tax affects them, when in reality it only affects the wealthiest 1% of Americans. Desmond explains why you too should be furious at the Republican attack on the middle class.
